select board_seq.nextval from dual
insert into board ( bno, title, content, writer, write_time, read_cnt, board_password, board_delete, username, cno) values (#{bno}, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, sysdate, #{read_Cnt}, #{password}, #{board_delete}, #{username}, #{cno})
mapper.select: select b.bno, b.title, b.content, b.writer, TO_CHAR(b.write_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS writeTime, nvl(b.read_cnt, 0) as read_cnt, b.board_password, b.board_delete, b.username, b.cno from board b where b.bno = #{bno}
